property.legal_description: Part of Lot 8, Concession 3, Town of Caledon, designated as Part 2 on Reference Plan 43R-98765
property.highest_and_best_use: Rural estate residential with hobby farm
property.improvements: 4,500 SF custom home (2015), 6-stall barn, riding arena

easement.access_requirements: Shared laneway access to tower locations

appraiser_notes: Rural estate property with significant improvements. The 230kV line will traverse the rear portion of the property, well separated from the residence and barn. Two steel monopole towers. Impact to highest and best use is minor as the corridor follows the property boundary away from improvements.
